messages.title: Vote for Change – Vote for the Common Good.
messages.content: Because Fair is Worth Fighting For.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes TTIP, which grants corporations power to sue governments and lock-in privatisation of public services like NHS. It threatens to slash regulations protecting workers, the environment, and food safety and standards, and poses a threat to democracy, favouring multinationals.

mentions.candidate: Brian Smith is the Green Party candidate for Staffordshire Moorlands Constituency.

issues.economy: Opposes TTIP which endangers democratic decision making, trade policies should favour the common good.
issues.environment: TTIP threatens regulations that protect the environment.
issues.governance: TTIP is a threat to democratic decision making.
issues.health: TTIP endangers the quality and safety of food, along with NHS standards.
